title: Toxic Comments Classifier
description:
• Developed a classification model to categorize comments into toxic, severe toxic, and obscene labels using Python and NLP techniques.
• Utilized Scikit-learn for implementing machine learning algorithms and vectorization for feature extraction from the text data.
• Integrated web tools for a seamless user interface.

title: Effect of Climate Change on Birds
description:
• Designed a regression model to forecast bird population trends based on climate factors such as temperature and precipitation.
• Utilized machine learning algorithms to analyze the effect of climate change on different bird species.

title: AgriBot-(Agricultural Robot)
description: This project is an IoT-based automated agricultural system with a robotic vehicle. It performs tasks like seeding, weeding, and soil moisture monitoring using an Arduino and various sensors. The entire system is controlled remotely via a mobile application.
